{"id":1052230336,"question_id":3104,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1695001609,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1052230336/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Students","memory":"56.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countWays(List<Integer> nums) {\n        Collections.sort(nums);\n        \n        int res = 0;\n        \n        if(nums.get(0)>0)\n            res++;\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++){\n            if(i==nums.size()-1){\n                \n                if(i+1>nums.get(i))\n                    res++;\n            }else{\n                \n                if(i+1>nums.get(i) && i+1<nums.get(i+1)){\n                    res++;\n                }\n                \n                \n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-students","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
